guide.introduction: A development board is a circuit board which helps your robot, or any electronic device to communicate with the external world.
guide.introduction_rendered:
A development board is a circuit board which helps your robot, or any electronic device to communicate with the external world.

Relevant parts
  • Atmega8 Microcontroller
  • Perforated board
  • Breakaway male headers
  • Connecting wire
  • LED
  • Resistor
  • Ceramic capacitor
  • Electrolytic capacitor
  • 28 Pin Socket
  • Reset Switch
  • Push button Switch
Tools
  • Multimeter
  • Solder Iron
